response.overview: This film is "the opposite of a combat description. It's a combat." This is how the author speaks, in an explicit reference to Marker's film, of this urgent film for Palestine.  Alberte Pagán presented a short and urgent film denouncing the situation of the Palestinian people. A film that recovers the maximum actuality of these days, the population of Gaza submitted to the attacks of the Israeli army, which caused more than a few deaths. The images of Urgent Film for Palestine were shot in 2011 in the occupied territories and tell the story of Dionísio Pereira in his Galician version. As its author, referring to Chris Marker, says, this film is "the opposite of a description of a combat, it's a fight”
response.title: Película urgente por Palestina
